backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user profiles, jobs, applications, messages, authorization checks, and CRUD/query functions with in‑memory maps and ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Flat JSON-style map providing short descriptions of multiple frontend files for documentation or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and loading the main React TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router, registers all app routes, wraps the app in theme and toaster providers, and renders the router.
frontend/src/components/applications/App: UI badge component that maps application status values to visual variants and human-readable labels.
Dropdown allowing employers to update an application’s status, calling backend hooks and showing toast feedback.
Card component for submitting or viewing a job application, handling form state, validation, and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gate component prompting users to log in with Internet Identity before accessing restricted pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Access-control component restricting pages to a required account type and guiding users to update settings if needed.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Renders a generic empty-state view with an icon, title, description, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing job postings, handling fields, skills, publication state, and deletion actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, authentication handling, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/messages/Message: Message input component that sends messages on Enter and supports multiline with Shift+Enter.
Displays a scrollable message thread, distinguishing messages by sender and showing timestamps.
frontend/src/components/profile/Candidat: Form for candidates to update location, skills, and bio, submitting changes via profile update hook.
frontend/src/components/profile/Employer: Form for employers to update company details including name, location, and description.
frontend/src/components/profile/SkillsIn: Interactive skills input allowing adding and removing skills with tags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApplications.ts: React Query hooks to fetch and mutate job applications, including applying, updating status, and retrieving applications by candidate or job.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides a hook to fetch the current user's profile via the backend actor with loading state enhancements.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobs.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, searching, creating, updating, and managing job listings and employer profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemberCount.ts: Fetches the total member count from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Hooks for retrieving and sending messages tied to a specific application.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks for creating accounts, updating user profiles, and fetching candidate profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPlatformPage.tsx: A static page describing the platform’s mission, features, values, and call to action.
frontend/src/pages/candidate/CandidateDa: Displays a candidate's job applications with statuses, loading states, and links to job details and messaging.
frontend/src/pages/employer/EmployerDash: Shows an employer's job postings, member count stats, and provides actions to create or manage jobs.
frontend/src/pages/employer/JobApplicati: Lists applications for a specific job, showing candidate details, application info, and status management controls.
frontend/src/pages/employer/JobEditorPag: Provides a form to create, edit, publish, or delete a job, handling loading states and role restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/FounderAboutPage.tsx: Renders a founder bio page with profile image, introduction, vision sections, and a call‑to‑action card.
frontend/src/pages/JobDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed job information, employer profile, and an apply card with loading states and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/JobsBrowsePage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable list of published jobs with dynamic filtering and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing homepage with hero, features, and conditional navigation based on authentication and user profile.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesThreadPage.ts: Loads an application's message thread, allows sending new messages, and includes refresh and authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Guides new authenticated users through selecting an account type and creating their profile before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the current user's profile page, showing appropriate forms or messages based on identity, loading state, and profile type.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shows account settings, including name and account type, and allows switching between employer and candidate profiles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s current state, including versioning, architectural notes, and a list of existing implemented features.
